intro: Limosella pretoriensis, commonly known as the Pretoria sandwort, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is a small, annual herb that typically grows in sandy or rocky soils. The plant produces tiny, white or pale blue flowers arranged in clusters, which bloom during the cooler months. It has a compact growth habit with thin, hairy stems and narrow leaves. Limosella pretoriensis is adapted to arid environments and is often found in coastal or inland sandy areas.
